wikipedia_page.main: Sir Thomas Somerset DL (14 December 1870 – 16 June 1947) was an industrialist and Ulster Unionist Member of Parliament (MP) for North Belfast from 1929 to 1945.

response: Thomas Somerset (by 1529–1586) was MP for Monmouthshire, Catholic prisoner under Elizabeth I.
Thomas Somerset may also refer to:
*Thomas Somerset (MP for Oxford), 14th century MP for Oxford and mayor
*Thomas Somerset (Northern Ireland politician) (1870–1947), Northern Irish Member of Parliament
*Thomas Somerset, Esq., D.L., M.P. For public services in Northern Ireland.
